## Examples

**Fetch list items**

When 80% way scrolled fetch another 10 items.

```js
const createItems = (length, from = 0) => Array.from({ length }, (_, i) => from + i);
const fetchMore = () => {
    if (state.isLoading) {
        return;
    }
    setState({ isLoading: true });
    setTimeout(() => {
        setState(state => ({
            isLoading: false,
            items: [...state.items, ...createItems(10, state.items.length)],
        }));
    }, 1000);
};
initialState = { items: createItems(20), isLoading: false };
<InfiniteScrollContainer onReachBottom={fetchMore}>
    <div style={{ height: 100, overflowY: 'scroll', backgroundColor: state.isLoading && 'red' }}>
        <ul>
            {state.items.map(i => <li key={i}>{i}</li>)}
        </ul>
    </div>
</InfiniteScrollContainer>
```

**Select**
```js
const createItems = (length, from = 0) => Array.from({ length }, (_, i) => from + i);
const fetchMore = () => {
    if (state.isLoading) {
        return;
    }
    setState({ isLoading: true });
    setTimeout(() => {
        setState(state => ({
            isLoading: false,
            items: [...state.items, ...createItems(10, state.items.length)],
        }));
    }, 3000);
};
initialState = { items: createItems(20), isLoading: false };
const Spin = require('antd').Spin;
<div style={{ display: 'flex' }}>
    <InfiniteScrollContainer onReachBottom={fetchMore}>
        <SelectWidget style={{ width: '100%' }}>
            {state.items.map(i =>
                <SelectWidget.Option key={i} value={i}>{i}</SelectWidget.Option>
            )}
            {state.isLoading && (
                <SelectWidget.Option disabled value="loading">
                    <Spin />
                </SelectWidget.Option>
            )}
        </SelectWidget>
    </InfiniteScrollContainer>
</div>
```
